text: Sanjay Kumar may refer to: *Sanjay Kumar (activist) (born 1976), Indian homeless advocate *Sanjay Kumar (business executive) (born 1962), Chairman and CEO of Computer Associates International *Sanjay Kumar (professor), director of Centre for the Study of Developing Societies *Sanjay Kumar (soldier) (born 1976), Indian Army soldier who received the Param Vir Chakra *Sanjay Kumar (wrestler, born 1983), Indian Greco-Roman wrestler *Sanjay Kumar (wrestler, born 1967), Indian freestyle wrestler
title: Sanjay Kumar
